content:
Hi, does US Core have a recommendation on how to store whether or not a patient was counseled on smoking cessation?

There is a US Core profile for smoking status, but I don't see anything specific for smoking counseling.

I do see a valueset for cessation counseling -- looks like these are procedure codes. Would smoking counseling simply be a Procedure resource in US Core?

What are other countries doing ?

https://build.fhir.org/ig/OHSUCMP/htnu18ig/ValueSet-2.16.840.1.113883.3.526.3.509.html
Counseling in general would be a Procedure resource.
